cordova-plugin-legacy-whitelist

Description

Deprecation Notice

This plugin implements the Cordova 3.6 Whitelist policy for Cordova 4.0. Please use cordova-plugin-whitelist instead, as itâ€™s more secure.

Supported on:

  • cordova-android@4.0.0
  • cordova-ios@4.0.0

Usage:

Use <access> tags, just as in previous versions of Cordova.
